Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2
School Specialization (Conjuration): +1 Conjuration spell/dy in each spell level
Craft Rod: May create magic rods
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Greater Lore: May use Identify effects at will
More Newfound Arcana: +1 level 2 spell
Newfound Arcana: +1 level 1 spell
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
School Opposition (Illusion): Cannot learn or cast Illusion spells
School Opposition (Transmutation): Cannot learn or cast Transmutation spells
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
True Lore: May use Legend Lore or Analyze Dweomer effects 1/dy
